name: Rooibos Punch
description: Rooibos means red bush tea, and it originates from South Africa. It has many health benefits and luckily can be found in most stores worldwide. This is a cocktail that turns tea into something more exciting.

ingredients.ingredient: Cooled Rooibos Tea (2 Tea Bags is usually enough)

directions: Combine all the ingredients in a large jug and stir well.
